title: Can we get a date as to when the championship skins are coming out?
body:
I've been seriously waiting for ever for the championship skins to come out this season i want championship riven SO badly. When is it coming out? this weekend? next wednesday? Next Thursday? please tell me. 
It's driving me craaaaaaaaaaaaazy.{{champion:92}}

replies.body:
I don't have a date, but I'm sure the official announcement will be posted on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) when dates are available.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Championship Zed was listed as being released patch 6.19? 
Was the mis-information?

The [6.19 Patch notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-619-notes#patch-upcoming-skins) mention:

> "For real this time. Look for Championship Zed to release as the World Championship draws closer!"

This means Championship Zed should release near Worlds, not during the beginning of the patch. Let me know if you have any questions.
Probably sometime right before Worlds start.
